item.title: 前瑞波公司员工承认为竞争对手 Deel 从事间谍活动
item.description: 爱尔兰一家法院周三公开的一份宣誓书显示，人力资源软件公司 Rippling 的一名前雇员承认，他在竞争对手 Deel Inc 首席执行官的指示下为该公司从事间谍活动。【原文：A former employee of HR software company Rippling has confessed to spying for Deel Inc under the directive of the rival firm's CEO, an affidavit made public in an Irish court showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普加征新关税，交易员押注美联储六月开始降息
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对进口商品征收新的关税，经济学家们认为这可能会刺激通胀，但也可能会拖累经济，因此交易商们加大了对美联储将于6月份开始降息并在10月份之前将政策利率总共下调三个季度点的押注。【原文：Traders boosted bets the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates in June and deliver a total of three quarter-point reductions to the policy rate by October, as U.S. President Donald Trump announced new tariffs on imports, which economists say could boost inflation but could also slow the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普公布全球互惠关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在白宫举行的一次活动中公布了全球互惠关税。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday unveiled global reciprocal tariffs during an event at the White House.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称通胀进展可能停滞，支持稳定利率政策
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周三表示，美国央行实现2%通胀目标的进展最近有所放缓，可能已经停滞不前，这也是维持利率不变的一个理由。【原文：Progress towards the U.S. central bank's 2% inflation target has slowed recently and may have stalled, Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Wednesday, a reason to keep interest rates where they are.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布加征关税，美元兑日元转为升值
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元走软，兑日元走高，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）开始宣布人们期待已久的全面新关税，这看起来肯定会使与全球伙伴的贸易战升级、物价上涨并颠覆已有几十年历史的贸易秩序。【原文：The dollar weakened against the euro and turned higher against the yen on Wednesday as U.S. President Donald Trump began a long awaited announcement of sweeping new tariffs that look certain to escalate a trade war with global partners, increase prices and upend a decades-old trade order.】

item.title: 初级保健公司 knownwell 加入礼来直销公司，提供体重管理服务
item.description: 初级保健公司 knownwell 周三表示，它将在礼来公司直接面向消费者的在线保健平台 LillyDirect 上提供健康和体重管理服务。【原文：Primary care company knownwell said on Wednesday it will provide health and weight-management services on Eli Lilly's direct-to-consumer online healthcare platform, LillyDirect.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：Meta 首席执行官扎克伯格游说特朗普避免反垄断审判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）正在游说美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和白宫官员同意一项和解协议，以避免该公司在本月晚些时候面临反垄断审判。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg is lobbying U.S. President Donald Trump and White House officials to agree to a settlement that would prevent the company from facing an antitrust trial later this month, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 里士满联储称，特朗普进口税对中西部和东南部的影响可能最大
item.description: 里士满联储（Richmond Federal Reserve）的一项新分析得出结论，特朗普政府征收或可能征收的新进口税可能会将进入美国的商品的平均有效关税率从目前的 2.2% 提高到 17% 左右，同时对中西部和南部各州的制造业造成 "广泛的破坏"。【原文：New import taxes imposed or potentially in the offing from the Trump administration could raise the average effective tariff rate on goods coming into the U.S. from the current 2.2% to around 17%, while posing "widespread disruptions" focused on manufacturing industries in Midwestern and Southern states, a new analysis from the Richmond Federal Reserve has concluded.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，特朗普顾问华尔兹的团队针对世界危机建立了 20 个信号群聊
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的国家安全顾问迈克-华尔兹的团队在商业应用程序Signal上建立了至少20个群聊，以协调涉及中国、加沙、中东政策、非洲和欧洲等问题的官方工作。【原文：The team of President Donald Trump's national security adviser, Mike Waltz, set up at least 20 group chats on the commercial Signal app to coordinate official work on issues involving China, Gaza, Middle East policy, Africa and Europe, Politico reported on Wednesday, citing four people who were added to Signal chats.】

item.title: 律师称印第安纳大学网络安全教授未遭逮捕或拘留
item.description: 印第安纳大学的一位著名教授突然被解雇并失踪，引起了网络安全界的关注，他的代理律师告诉路透社记者，他没有被拘留，他和他的妻子也没有受到任何未决的刑事指控。【原文：A prominent Indiana University professor whose abrupt firing and disappearance drew interest in the cybersecurity community has not been detained and there are no pending criminal charges against him or his wife, a lawyer representing him told Reuters.】

item.title: 西门子将以 51 亿美元收购 Dotmatics
item.description: 西门子公司周三表示，将以 51 亿美元的价格从 Insight Partners 手中收购总部位于美国的 Dotmatics 公司。【原文：Siemens AG said on Wednesday it will acquire U.S.-based Dotmatics for $5.1 billion from Insight Partners.】

item.title: 联邦公报显示，特朗普 25% 的汽车关税将于美国东部时间 4 月 3 日上午 12:01 生效
item.description: 根据《联邦公报》（Federal Register）上的一则公告，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）25%的汽车关税将于美国东部时间周四上午12:01生效。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's 25% automobile tariffs are due to take effect at 12:01 a.m. ET on Thursday, according to a post in the Federal Register.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普考虑取消对中国廉价货物的关税豁免
item.description: 一位熟悉计划的消息人士称，作为周三关税声明的一部分，特朗普政府正在考虑取消对来自中国的低价值货物的关税豁免。【原文：The Trump administration is considering revoking tariff exemptions for low-value shipments from China as part of Wednesday's tariff announcement, a source familiar with the plans said.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官表示，波音正与司法部合作修改 737 MAX 欺诈案的认罪协议
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周三表示，波音公司正在与美国司法部商讨，以就该公司涉嫌就737 MAX飞机上的一个关键系统向监管机构作出虚假陈述而引发的刑事欺诈案达成修订认罪协议。【原文：Boeing is in discussions with the U.S. Department of Justice to reach a revised plea agreement in a criminal fraud case stemming from the planemaker's alleged misrepresentations to regulators about a key system on the 737 MAX, company CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Wednesday.】

item.title: GE Vernova 将在 2026 年之前为宾夕法尼亚州规划中的天然气发电厂提供涡轮机
item.description: GE Vernova 将提供七台涡轮机，生产近 4.5 千兆瓦（GW）的电力，从而帮助宾夕法尼亚州的霍默市发电站（以前是一家煤电厂）转变为以天然气为动力的数据中心园区。【原文：GE Vernova will aid in turning Homer City Generating Station — previously a coal-power plant in Pennsylvania — into a natural gas-powered data center campus by providing seven turbines to produce nearly 4.5 gigawatts (GW) of power.】

item.title: OnlyFans 创始人和加密基金会提交收购 TikTok 的后期竞标书
item.description: 由成人内容社交网站 OnlyFans 创始人蒂姆-斯托克利（Tim Stokely）运营的一家初创公司与一家加密货币基金会合作，提交了一份后期计划，准备从中国公司字节跳动手中收购短视频应用 TikTok。【原文：A startup run by Tim Stokely, founder of adult content social media site OnlyFans, has partnered with a cryptocurrency foundation to submit a late-stage plan to acquire short video app TikTok from Chinese owner ByteDance, the two said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌双子座高管萧泓将卸任
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周三对其人工智能部门的员工表示，将撤换领导人工智能聊天机器人 "巴德"（Bard）（现名 "双子座"）开发工作的萧泓（Sissie Hsiao）。【原文：Alphabet's Google is replacing Sissie Hsiao, who led the development of the artificial intelligence chatbot Bard, now known as Gemini, the company told staff in its AI division on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊计划于 4 月 9 日发射首批 Kuiper 互联网卫星
item.description: 亚马逊周三表示，它计划在本月为其 "柯伊伯计划"（Project Kuiper）互联网网络发射首批27颗卫星，这是一个崭露头角的星座期待已久的时刻，它将对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）庞大的 "星链"（Starlink）系统构成最大的挑战。【原文：Amazon on Wednesday said it plans to launch this month the first 27 satellites for its Project Kuiper internet network, a long-awaited moment for a budding constellation that will pose the biggest challenge yet to Elon Musk's massive Starlink system.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局增加华盛顿机场的人员编制，可能会减缓航班抵达速度
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周三表示，在 1 月 29 日一架直升机与美国航空公司一架支线飞机相撞造成 67 人死亡后，可能会放慢里根华盛顿国家机场的航班到达速度。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday it may slow flight arrivals at Reagan Washington National Airport after a January 29 collision between a helicopter and an American Airlines regional jet that killed 67 people.】

item.title: PIMCO 加强对新兴市场政府的私人贷款
item.description: 债券巨头 PIMCO 新兴市场投资组合管理负责人周三表示，仅今年一年，PIMCO 就向新兴市场借款人（主要是政府）提供了近 60 亿美元的私人贷款，确保了更高的回报和更好的贷款人保护。【原文：Bond giant PIMCO has privately lent nearly $6 billion to emerging market borrowers, mostly governments, this year alone, securing higher returns and better lender protections, its head of emerging markets portfolio management said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：加拿大跨山输油管道下调石油运输量预期
item.description: 加拿大跨山石油管道运营商提交的文件显示，由于新扩建管道的使用量增长速度低于预期，该公司下调了对未来三年预计流经其系统的石油量的预测。【原文：Canada's Trans Mountain oil pipeline has downgraded forecasts for the amount of oil expected to flow through its system over the next three years, documents filed by the operator show, as use of the newly expanded pipeline increases more slowly than expected.】

item.title: 据报道使用 Gmail 后，白宫称华尔兹没有发送机密材料
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的国家安全顾问从未使用个人电子邮件帐户发送机密材料，此前有报道称迈克-华尔兹和其他国家安全委员会成员使用 Gmail 进行政府工作。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's national security adviser has never used his personal email account to send classified material, the White House said, following a report that Mike Waltz and other National Security Council members used Gmail for government work.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦：特朗普关税不会导致欧洲通胀率下降
item.description: 欧洲央行（ECB）决策者弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周三表示，美国政府的关税上调不应破坏欧洲通胀率的持续下降。【原文：The U.S. administration's tariff hikes should not derail an ongoing decline in inflation in Europe, ECB policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Wednesday, adding that the fall boosted the case for a fresh interest rate cut.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，亚马逊竞购 TikTok 的最后期限即将到来
item.description: 纽约时报》周三援引熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道，亚马逊公司已在最后一刻提出收购短视频应用 TikTok。【原文：Amazon.com has put in a last-minute offer to buy short-form video app TikTok, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国关税颠覆日本汽车制造商的墨西哥赌局--日产汽车雪上加霜
item.description: 长期以来，日本汽车制造商一直依靠其经济型汽车 "可靠、实惠 "的吸引力来推动美国汽车销量，这在一定程度上要归功于墨西哥的低成本生产。现在，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在颠覆这种商业模式。【原文：Japanese automakers have long relied on the "dependable and affordable" appeal of their economy cars to drive U.S. sales, thanks in part to low-cost production in Mexico. Now, U.S. President Donald Trump is turning that business model on its head.】

item.title: 特朗普政府将啤酒和易拉罐进口产品纳入 25% 的美国铝关税征收范围
item.description: 美国商务部周三修订了唐纳德-特朗普总统对衍生铝产品征收的25%关税，将所有啤酒和空铝罐进口产品也包括在内。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Wednesday revised President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs on derivative aluminum products to include all beer and empty aluminum can imports.】

item.title: 美国监管机构暂停殖民地管道公司修改燃料运输条款的提议
item.description: 联邦能源管理委员会发布命令，暂停 Colonial 管道公司对燃料运输条款的拟议修改，为期七个月。【原文：The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission issued an order to suspend Colonial Pipeline's proposed changes to fuel shipping terms for seven months.】

item.title: 消息人士称，飞行员工会中断了有关汉莎航空裁员计划的谈判
item.description: 熟悉谈判情况的消息人士周三告诉路透社，VC 飞行员工会正在中断与汉莎航空就该公司核心品牌裁员建议的谈判，因为该工会认为汉莎航空对就业水平的承诺不够充分。【原文：The VC pilots union is breaking off talks with Lufthansa on proposed cuts at the airline's core brand because it believes the airline's commitments on employment levels are insufficient, sources familiar with the negotiations told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，欧盟将批准赛峰集团价值 18 亿美元的柯林斯项目交易
item.description: 据直接知情人士周三透露，欧盟反垄断监管机构将批准法国发动机和飞机设备制造商赛峰集团以 18 亿美元收购柯林斯宇航公司的飞行控制业务。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are set to approve French engine and aircraft equipment maker Safran's $1.8 billion bid for Collins Aerospace's flight controls business, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统表示不会与美国针锋相对地征收关税
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆周三表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布征收新关税的计划之前，墨西哥不打算对美国征收报复性关税。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Wednesday that Mexico doesn't plan to impose retaliatory tariffs on the United States, ahead of President Donald Trump's announcement of plans to impose new tariffs.】
